member.name: T:Waher.Security.CallStack.Assert
member.summary: Static class containing methods that can be used to make sure calls are made from appropriate locations.

member.summary: Makes sure the call is made from one of the listed assemblies.
member.param: Original call must be made from one of these assemblies.

member.summary: Makes sure the call is made from one of the listed classes.
member.param: Original call must be made from one of these classes.

member.summary: Makes sure the call is made from one of the listed sources.
member.param: Original call must be made from one of these sources.
